lines: !throw You are not a registered player! Please use `!e new_game` first.
!if {!tag {me} equip_weapon} != 🎸 or {!is {me} used_guitar} = True and {id} = ID34
!else {!tag {me} equip_weapon} != 🪄 and {!ioo {id} ID39 ID49 ID70} = True
!else {!is {me} sacrificed} = True or {!tag {me} hp} <= 10 and {id} = ID78
!else {!tag {me} equip_weapon} != 🔫 or {!is {me} shot_self} = True and {id} = ID90
!else {!is {me} first_attack} = True or {!is {me} used_emblem} = True and {id} = ID95
!say {!data item {id} params emoji} {!data item {id} title}: {!tag {me} inv_{id}}
!say You have no {match} Items right now.
